tool_description: Validates availability of veterinary staff for specific time slots, checking technician and veterinarian schedules for imaging appointments.

staff_ids.description: Array of staff member IDs to check availability for

error_messages: Invalid staff IDs: One or more staff member IDs not found in system.
Invalid appointment time: Appointment time must be in the future and during business hours.
Invalid duration: Duration must be between 15 and 180 minutes.
Staff unavailable: One or more required staff members are not available at the specified time.
usage: Provide staff_ids array, appointment_time, and duration_minutes to verify staff availability for imaging appointments.

all_available.description: Whether all requested staff members are available

available_staff.description: Array of staff IDs who are available

unavailable_staff.description: Array of staff IDs who are not available

alternative_times.description: Array of alternative time slots when all staff are available
